architectural_resources: Web application packaged as a WAR (pom.xml, hello-1.0.war)
Servlet-based HTTP endpoint (/hello) deployed on Tomcat (src/main/java/.../HelloServlet.java, Dockerfile)
Container image build pipeline (multi-stage Docker build using Maven) (Dockerfile, deploy/Dockerfile)
Ansible-managed hosts/environments: dev01 and stage01 (playbook.yml, deploy/playbook.yml)
Docker engine on target hosts (installed via Ansible) (playbook.yml, deploy/playbook.yml)
Running container exposing HTTP port 8080 on the host (playbook.yml, deploy/playbook.yml)
